Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Main Street Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street heads west out of Rosecrest Street, traveling through the central part of the southwestern section of town. The Ivanhouse Sporting Facility is located to the east where combatants fight more evenly-matched gladiators on a one-on-one confrontation to the death. The entrance to the facility is located off of Netherworld Lane, to the south.
